channel.title: Need help please
channel.description:
Hello, I am Josh I am currently wanting to work on a game I want to use a base off of moparscape, and get rid of all the models in game, and I would like to start from sratch. No skills in the game, no money nothing, but the files required to make it. I will be working on this for the next couple months / years. I am hoping to make this like runescape, but has a comeplty different feel to it. I would like to try, and work towards making this like the following games. "world of warcraft", "Runescape", "Perfect world" and "combat arms" I know this will be a lot of work. many years will be have to put into it, but I feel That while I do this It will also teach me how to code, and I won't feel ashamed of playing Runescape Private servers. I only acually played to learn how to do this. Now here is you're chance to help. I require a:
* Source with only the required Files to play it *client with no models *Have the the Files to play and add stuff
Thank you all for your help.

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:5, topic:364460”]you are looking for framework. here are some downloads that are pretty close to what you are looking for.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309081.0.html - Yz85Racer
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381494.0.html - Graham & blakeman8192
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437809.0/topicseen.html - PeeHPee & blakeman8192
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,227037.0.html - varek

most of these arent as bare as you would like them to be, but its pretty much as close as you can get. also, if your going for a 317 revision, you can use this blank client or the moparscape web client.

http://www.mediafire.com/?u977iuzutkb11wa

gl with your coding bro.[/quote]
The issue is that the server has models in it. I guess before I do much. I am gonna Try and, get some people to elp work on it with me. I just got my first weapon done. lmfao not even a person or ground base

Read full topic

you are looking for framework. here are some downloads that are pretty close to what you are looking for.

most of these arent as bare as you would like them to be, but its pretty much as close as you can get. also, if your going for a 317 revision, you can use this blank client or the moparscape web client.

http://www.mediafire.com/?u977iuzutkb11wa

gl with your coding bro.

Read full topic

Hello, I am Josh I am currently wanting to work on a game I want to use a base off of moparscape, and get rid of all the models in game, and I would like to start from sratch. I would like to try, and work towards making this like the following games. “world of warcraft”, “Runescape”, “Perfect world” and “combat arms” I know this will be a lot of work. many years will be have to put into it, but I feel That while I do this It will also teach me how to code, and I won’t feel ashamed of playing Runescape Private servers.     *client with no models
    *Have the the Files to play and add stuff

Thank you all for your help.
[/quote]
you can find those all over moparscape just go look its not that hard just search it in the box[/quote]I don’t feel you understand. I am looking for a client / source with absouletly nothing in it only codes to log in and out. no ground no models no trees no skys. no sprties that’s not all over moparscape.

Read full topic
